CustomField.description: Business hours between Date assigned and Date approved for a request considering default business hours as 8 AM - 6 PM (as mentioned in company profile-default business hours)
CustomField.formula: ROUND( 10 * ( ( 5 * FLOOR( ( DATEVALUE( Apttus_Approval__DateApproved__c ) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7) + MIN(5, MOD( DATEVALUE( Apttus_Approval__DateApproved__c ) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7) + MIN( 1, 24 / 10 * ( MOD( Apttus_Approval__DateApproved__c - DATETIMEVALUE( '1900-01-07 22:00:00' ), 1 ) ) ) ) ) - ( 5 * FLOOR( ( DATEVALUE( Apttus_Approval__DateAssigned__c ) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7) + MIN( 5, MOD( DATEVALUE( Apttus_Approval__DateAssigned__c ) - DATE( 1996, 1, 1), 7 ) + MIN( 1, 24 / 10 * ( MOD( Apttus_Approval__DateAssigned__c - DATETIMEVALUE( '1900-01-07 22:00:00' ), 1) ) ) ) ) ), 0 )
CustomField.label: Request Approved Business Hours
